1111110011110000
0010110000000000 //MOVI REG12 1111000000000000
1111000000000000
0010000000000101 //MOVI REG0 .start_menu
0100000011000000 //JCND NC REG0
1111000000001111
0010000000000111 //MOVI REG0 0000111100000111
1101000100000000 //MOVI REG1 00000000
0100000101000000 //STOR REG1 REG0
1111000000000100
0010000001000111 //MOVI REG0 .clear_text

1111000000000100

0100101110000000 //JAL REG11 REG0

0100000011110000 //LCI REG0 player1

0010000101100011 //MOVI REG1 .return_update_tank_location_player1
1011110100000000 //CMPI REG13 00000000
1100000100000101 //BCND EQ 00000101 // Dump the bounding box parameters
0101110000000001

0101110000000001
